Product Factory

Manufacturing Production Capacity

Factory

INTPHO Technology Co., Ltd. founded in 2008 and located in china, We are dedicated to designing, developing and manufacturing high quality glass optics products, lenses, coatings and precision glass solutions, Led by a staff of skilled optical engineers and excellent management team, Equipped with advanced manufacturing machines and metrology, such as ZYGO GPI-XP Pekin-Elmer Lambda 900 spectrophotometer, Japanese Laser Interferometer, embedded excellence throughout its operations, leveraging advanced quality procedures and state-of-the-art processes to ensure that all products meet customer specifications and quality requirements.

INTPHO

INTPHO Technology Co., Ltd. founded in 2008 and located in china, We are dedicated to designing, developing and manufacturing high quality glass optics products, lenses, coatings and precision glass solutions, Led by a staff of skilled optical engineers and excellent management team, Equipped with advanced manufacturing machines and metrology, such as ZYGO GPI-XP interferometer, Pekin-Elmer Lambda 900 spectrophotometer, Japanese Laser Interferometer, embedded excellence throughout its operations, leveraging advanced quality procedures and state-of-the-art processes to ensure that all products meet customer specifications and quality requirements.
